mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_cashbook(cashbook_index, cashbook_date, cashbook_type, cashbook_content, cashbook_amount, cashbook_balance, club_no) VALUES (#{cashbook_index}, #{cashbook_date}, #{cashbook_type}, #{cashbook_content}, #{cashbook_amount}, #{cashbook_balance}, #{club_no})
mapper.update: update club_cashbook set cashbook_index=#{cashbook_index}, cashbook_date=#{cashbook_date}, cashbook_type=#{cashbook_type}, cashbook_content=#{cashbook_content}, cashbook_amount=#{cashbook_amount}, cashbook_balance=#{cashbook_balance} where cashbook_no=#{cashbook_no}
mapper.select: select * from club_cashbook order by cashbook_date, cashbook_no
